titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: APPOINTMENT SLOT SHORT NOTICE CANCELLATION INDICATOR - Description

body.p:
An indication of whether the APPOINTMENT SLOT could be reallocated, where the ATTENDED OR DID NOT ATTEND National Code is '
APPOINTMENT
cancelled by, or on behalf of, the
PATIENT ' , where the APPOINTMENT was cancelled at short notice.

Note: For the Improving Access to Psychological Therapies Data Set , short notice is determined locally. See the NHS Digital website at: Improving Access to Psychological Therapies Data Set for further guidance.
